location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Part of El Kasr, Babylon.' Photographer: Wilfrid Malleson

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:104 x 148 mmCondition:The print is in good condition with minor surface dirt throughout.Foliation:‘44’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject MatterView over Babylon (near Al Hillah). The remains of large fortified walls can be seen in the background while a stony, rubble-filled area takes up most of the scene in the fore- and middle-ground.InscriptionsInk, below image: 'Part of El Kasr, Babylon.'
